join.title: Join the $Li Community
join.content: We sincerely invite you to become a member of the $Li Community. This is a group dedicated to promoting democracy, freedom of speech, and press freedom in China. Join our Telegram group to connect with like-minded partners, share views, and work together to drive positive change.

committee.title: Join the Preparatory Committee
committee.intro: Do you have innovative ideas or professional skills? We are forming a preparatory committee aimed at guiding the $Li Community towards a DDAO (Democratized Decentralized Autonomous Organization) model.

roles.visionary: Visionary with unique insights: Possesses DAO or innovative project concepts aligned with our values.
roles.tech: Technical Expert: Experience in front-end/back-end development; blockchain development, especially in Rust and Solana ecosystems.
roles.design: Creative Designer: Proficient in UI/UX, graphic design, or other creative fields.
roles.rights: Democracy and Human Rights Advocate: Experienced in democracy, human rights, and freedom of speech fields.

why.title: Why Join?
why.mission: Join hands with passionate like-minded partners.
why.freedom: Participate in the great cause of promoting freedom, human rights, and democratic experimentation.
why.future: Play a vital role in shaping the future blueprint of the $Li Community.

card1.title: Community Core Values
card1.description: $Li hopes to build a unique community that defends human rights, press freedom, and freedom of speech in an authoritarian environment like China. As the $Li community grows, we aim to build consensus and jointly promote these core values.

card2.title: "Niuma ICU" — Exposing Sweatshop Companies
card2.description: The latest project initiated by the Li community — "Niuma ICU" — aims to collect a list of companies with excessive overtime work nationwide, allowing the public to learn which companies exploit workers, and thereby pressure relevant authorities to fulfill their duties and improve the living conditions of Chinese laborers.
card2.note: If you or someone around you has experienced overtime work, unpaid overtime, or harsh working conditions, you can anonymously register the information of these companies to help more workers avoid these “sweatshops” and jointly promote social progress.

solidarityCard.title: United for Change
solidarityCard.description: If labor departments and unions choose to turn a blind eye, then let us unite to force them to do their jobs. Every registration and exposure is a step towards putting pressure on exploitative companies and inactive institutions.
solidarityCard.slogan: Let the "Niuma" live like people, not machines!

backgroundCard.title: Project Initiation and Purpose
backgroundCard.description: Niuma ICU is a public welfare project initiated by the “$Li Community” and “Teacher Li Is Not Your Teacher”. We aim to investigate and expose all the exploitation and harsh treatment of workers in China!
backgroundCard.slogan: Reject 996! Reject endless overtime! Reject exploitation! Reject oppression! Reject all unequal treatment!
